name: observation_method_in_oi
chinese_name: 由《茧》出发举例分析观察法在信息学竞赛中的应用
author: 李嘉佑
summary: This paper explores the application of observation and pattern recognition in solving competitive programming problems, emphasizing intuitive insights and empirical analysis over formal algorithmic techniques. It uses examples to demonstrate how careful observation of small cases, data patterns, and problem constraints can lead to efficient solutions.
